Gucheng county in Xiangfan 襄樊[Xiang1 fan2], Hubei

sentences.english: Zhou Gucheng concerns himself with Chinas modernization from the period of the War of Resistence Against Japan.
sentences.chinese: 從抗戰時期起周谷城就關心國家的現代化問題。

sentences.english: There was an evolution process in Zhou Gucheng s ancient history staging concept.
sentences.chinese: 周谷城的古史分期觀有其演變過程。

sentences.english: Zhou Gucheng was an outstanding patriot.
sentences.chinese: 周谷城是傑出的愛國主義者。

sentences.english: Zhou Gucheng is a respectable educationist.
sentences.chinese: 周谷城是受人敬重的教育家。
